Module com.cyslide
Package com.cyslide.Model

Class RectangleDragHandler

java.lang.Object
com.cyslide.Model.RectangleDragHandler
public class RectangleDragHandler extends Object
A class that handles dragging and swapping of rectangles in a game. This class is responsible for handling mouse events, keyboard events, and managing the movement and swapping of rectangles.
